commit.message:
mips.c (mips_expand_prologue): Change uses of TARGET_64BIT to TARGET_LONG64.

        * mips.c (mips_expand_prologue): Change uses of TARGET_64BIT
        to TARGET_LONG64.

From-SVN: r17594

files.patch:

+	* mips.c (mips_expand_prologue): Change uses of TARGET_64BIT
+	to TARGET_LONG64.
